parts.name: Showing Your Mac on the Finder Sidebar

steps.headline: Open up the Finder Preferences.
steps.description: From the Finder menu, select Finder Preferences...

steps.headline: Enable your device.
steps.description: In the Finder Preferences window, press Sidebar at the top. Under Devices, locate your Mac icon (it's the one with the name you just set).

steps.headline: Click the checkbox next to it.
steps.description: Check any other devices or servers you want to appear in the sidebar, and then close the window. Your Mac should now appear in the Finder's sidebar.
